settings.title: Upload protocol
settings.keywords: media, photos, videos, attachments, audio, files, upload
settings.description: The PUT method is more efficient for uploading files to the server and the preferred method when uploading very large files. Make sure your server supports it before you changing the setting.
settings.name: media_upload_protocol

settings.title: Force use of Catch-All menu for media urls
settings.description: You need to create the Catch-All menu for Media. If disabled, JReviews category menu ids will be used if they exist.
settings.name: media_url_catchall

settings.title: No Image Path
settings.description: When changing the image use a different file name so new thumbnails can be generated.
settings.name: media_general_default_image_path

settings.title: Video Processing Path
settings.keywords: media, default, videos, path, missing, encoding, processing
settings.description: Set the path of the default 'processing' image shown while videos and are in the process of being encoded.
settings.name: media_general_default_video_path

settings.title: Default Media Order
settings.description: This is the ordering that will be used in media list pages.
settings.name: media_general_default_order

settings.title: Default Media Order - Listing Specific
settings.description: This is the ordering that will be used in listing detail pages and photo and video galleries for a specific listing.
settings.name: media_general_default_order_listing

settings.title: Display Terms & Conditions in upload page
settings.description: The terms will only display for regular users.
settings.name: media_general_tos

settings.title: Add additional link to Submission Guidelines page
settings.description: Enter the Page/Article ID you want to use. You can find the ID in the URL when editing a Page/Article.
settings.name: media_general_tos_articleid

settings.title: Display 'More by username' link
settings.description: Links to my media page for the user that submitted the media. Displays in standalone media gallery pages.
settings.name: media_display_more_by

settings.title: Show Main Media Thumbnail
settings.keywords: media, listings, list, main, thumbnail, photo
settings.name: media_list_thumbnail

settings.title: Thumbnail Mode
settings.keywords: media, listings, list, main, thumbnail, photos, crop, scale
settings.description: Set the list page thumbnail mode to scale or crop
settings.name: media_list_thumbnail_mode

settings.title: Thumbnail Size
settings.keywords: media, listings, list, main, thumbnail, photos, size, pixels
settings.name: media_list_thumbnail_size

settings.title: Use Category Image
settings.keywords: media, listings, list, main, thumbnail, category, default
settings.name: media_list_category_image

settings.title: Use Default Image
settings.keywords: media, listings, list, main, thumbnail, category, default
settings.description: Used if both category and main media thumbnails are not available.
settings.name: media_list_default_image

settings.title: Separate Listing Owner and User uploaded media
settings.keywords: media, listings, detail, main, separate, user, owner, uploads
settings.description: Photos and video only. Listing Owner media displays in main area of the listing detail page while Review media will appear in individual reviews. Links to view 'All', 'Listing' and 'Users' photos and videos will also be displayed unless lightbox or gallery layouts are used.
settings.name: media_detail_separate_media

settings.title: Photo Display Layout
settings.keywords: media, photos, layout, gallery, lightbox, contact sheet, film strip
settings.description: Choose the detail page layout: gallery, lightbox, contact sheet, film strip.
settings.name: media_detail_photo_layout

settings.title: Video Display Layout
settings.keywords: media, videos, layout, player, lightbox, contact sheet, film strip
settings.description: Choose the detail page layout: full with player, lightbox, contact sheet, film strip.
settings.name: media_detail_video_layout

settings.title: Audio Downloads
settings.description: Displays a download button next to each track.
settings.name: media_detail_audio_downloads

settings.title: Sync Main Media Photo with Article Image
settings.description: Only works with local storage. Copies the main media URL to the chosen Joomla article image setting to allow 3rd party plugins and modules to use the Main Media from JReviews.
settings.name: media_article_sync

settings.title: Sync Main Media Photo with Post Featured Image
settings.name: media_article_sync

settings.title: Hide Article Image
settings.keywords: media, article, image, introtext, fulltext, summary, description
settings.description: Supresses the output of the core Joomla article images in the listing detail page.
settings.name: media_article_hide

settings.title: Main Media Thumbnail
settings.description: Enable to display main media thumbnail separately.
settings.name: media_detail_main

settings.title: Disable Main Media Link
settings.description: Disable the lightbox for photos when set as main media. Gallery photos will continue opening in a lightbox if Photo Lightbox is enabled.
settings.name: media_detail_main_lightbox_disable

settings.title: Main Media Thumbnail Mode
settings.keywords: media, photos, main, thumbnail, crop, scale, mode
settings.description: Set the detail page main media thumbnail mode to scale or crop.
settings.name: media_detail_main_thumbnail_mode

settings.title: Main Media Thumbnail Size
settings.keywords: media, photos, main, thumbnail, size, pixels
settings.name: media_detail_main_thumbnail_size

settings.title: Show category/default image using above settings for List Pages
settings.keywords: media, photos, main, default, category, image
settings.description: Enable the display of a default image in detail pages.
settings.name: media_detail_default

settings.title: Thumbnail alignment
settings.description: Set left or right thumbnail alignment for the detail page
settings.name: media_detail_main_thumbnail_alignment

settings.title: Gallery Thumbnail Mode
settings.keywords: media, photos, contact sheet, film strip, crop, scale
settings.description: Set the detail page gallery thumbnail mode to scale or crop.
settings.name: media_detail_gallery_thumbnail_mode

settings.title: Gallery Thumbnail Size
settings.keywords: media, photos, contact sheet, film strip, size, pixels
settings.description: Set the detail page gallery thumbnail size.
settings.name: media_detail_gallery_thumbnail_size

settings.title: Display photo info as overlay on mouseover
settings.description: Applies to full will gallery only
settings.name: media_photo_gallery_overlay

settings.title: Photo Limit when linking to separate gallery page
settings.description: After this number visitors need to go to the gallery page for the listing to view all photos
settings.name: media_detail_photo_limit

settings.title: Video Limit when linking to separate gallery page
settings.description: After this number visitors need to go to the gallery page for the listing to view all videos
settings.name: media_detail_video_limit

settings.title: Gallery Thumbnail Mode
settings.keywords: media, reviews, gallery, thumbnails, photos, crop, scale
settings.description: Set the review page thumbnail mode to scale or crop.
settings.name: media_review_gallery_thumbnail_mode

settings.title: Gallery Thumbnail Size
settings.keywords: media, reviews, gallery, thumbnails, photos, size, pixels
settings.description: Set the review page gallery thumbnail size.
settings.name: media_review_gallery_thumbnail_mode

settings.title: Photo Limit in reviews
settings.description: After this number visitors need to go to the gallery page for the listing to view all photos.
settings.name: media_review_photo_limit

settings.title: Video Limit in reviews
settings.description: After this number visitors need to go to the gallery page for the listing to view all videos.
settings.name: media_review_video_limit

settings.title: Media List Layout
settings.description: Set the media page list layout to thumbview or masonry.
settings.name: media_list_layout

settings.title: Media List Thumbnail Mode
settings.keywords: media, list, thumbnails, mode, crop, scale
settings.description: Set the media list page thumbnail mode to scale or crop.
settings.name: media_media_thumbnail_mode

settings.title: Replace filename with listing title
settings.keywords: media, photos, upload, filename, listing, title
settings.name: media_photo_filename_title

settings.title: Max Photos per Listing per User
settings.keywords: media, photos, upload, listings, users, maximum
settings.description: Leave blank for no limit. Set to zero to disable uploads.
settings.name: media_photo_max_uploads_listing

settings.title: Max Photos per Review per User
settings.keywords: media, photos, upload, reviews, users, maximum
settings.description: Leave blank for no limit. Set to zero to disable uploads.
settings.name: media_photo_max_uploads_review

settings.name: media_video_filename_title

settings.description: Leave blank for no limit. Set to zero to disable uploads.

settings.name: media_attachment_filename_title
